data.title: Where Was â€˜Curious Caterer: Dying for Chocolateâ€™ Filmed? See Cast & Locations
data.meta_description: Learn all about Curious Caterer, including where it was filmed and the cast involved.
data.text:
Hallmark Movies & Mysteries is premiering â€œCurious Caterer: Dying for Chocolateâ€ on Sunday, April 10, at 9 p.m. Eastern/8 p.m. Central. The movie stars Nikki DeLoach and Andrew Walker. Read on to learn all about where the movie was filmed and the cast involved.

â€˜Curious Caterer: Dying for Chocolateâ€™ Was Filmed in Canada

â€œCurious Caterer: Dying for Chocolateâ€ was filmed in Canada, like many other Hallmark movies. The movie was filmed in the British Columbia area, including Vancouver, according to IMDbPro.

During filming, Andrew Walker shared that he took a road trip to Whistler while working in Vancouver.

The movie is based on a book published in 1992 called â€œDying for Chocolate.â€ It was book two in â€œA Culinary Mysteryâ€ series (also called the â€œGoldy Schulz seriesâ€), FictionDB reported, and written by Diane Mott Davidson. Davidson has written a total of 17 books in the series, with the last one published in 2013.

When speaking with Swing My Heart Podcast, Walker said he hopes this movie will end up being turned into a series.

Walker told Southern Living that it was great to work with DeLoach again.

â€œI feel like it was such a gift to be able to do it with Nikki,â€ he said. â€œâ€¦We saidâ€¦because weâ€™d already done three movies together, we have the trust of the audience so letâ€™s try to do something and bring something to people thatâ€™s much different than anything theyâ€™d ever seen us in.â€

He shared a photo from filming at 4 a.m.

Walker said he studied detectives on shows like â€œTrue Detectiveâ€ and â€œMare of Easttownâ€ to help prepare for his role. He said on Instagram that he loved the gig and is â€œso thankful I get to play this character.â€

DeLoach also shared a photo while filming late at night.

She said it was so cold during night filming in Canada that she had to wear â€œtwo thermals, two pairs of tights, and a pair of Lulemons.â€

She shared this next photo when they wrapped on March 5.

Walker replied, â€œBUT I DONâ€™T WANNA WRAP!! ğŸ˜«â€

Hereâ€™s another behind-the-scenes photo.

And a fun video she shared during a night shoot is below.

She also wrote that she felt very lucky to work with Lochlyn Munro.

Meet the Cast

The synopsis reads: â€œColorado caterer Goldy Berry teams with detective Tom Schultz to identify the ingredients that led to the mysterious death of her friend â€” and ends up discovering a hidden recipe for murder.â€

Nikki DeLoach is Goldy. She lives in Los Angeles with her husband, Ryan Goodell, and two sons. Sheâ€™s a passionate advocate for The Alzheimerâ€™s Association and the Childrenâ€™s Hospital Los Angeles.

Her credits include â€œTaking the Reins,â€ â€œCranberry Christmas,â€ â€œSweet Autumn,â€ â€œTwo Turtle Doves,â€ â€œLove Takes Flight,â€ â€œLove to the Rescue,â€ â€œReunited at Christmas,â€ â€œTruly Madly Sweetly,â€ â€œThe Perfect Catch,â€ â€œAwkward.â€ (Lacey), â€œChristmas Land,â€ â€œRinger,â€ â€œDays of Our Livesâ€ (Brenda), â€œWindfallâ€ (Sunny), â€œNorth Shoreâ€ (Mary), â€œMisery Loves Companyâ€ (Tracy), â€œFive More Minutes,â€ and more.

Andrew Walker is Tom. Heâ€™s married to Cassandra Troy and they have two sons. They recently decided to start making date night a priority.

Walker will next be seen in the sci-fi feature â€œOxalis,â€ which he also produced. His credits include â€œThe 27-Hour Day,â€ â€œChristmas Tree Lane,â€ â€œSweet Autumn,â€ â€œChristmas on My Mind,â€ â€œMerry & Bright,â€ â€œBottled with Love,â€ â€œA Christmas in Tennessee,â€ â€œLove in Design,â€ â€œGod Bless the Broken Road,â€ â€œWedding March 4â€ (Rob), â€œMy Secret Valentine,â€ â€œSnowed-Inn Christmas,â€ â€œLove Struck Cafe,â€ â€œLove on Ice,â€ â€œAppetite for Love,â€ â€œWhen Calls the Heart,â€ â€œAgainst the Wallâ€ (John Brody), â€œWithout a Trace,â€ â€œ10.5: Apocalypse,â€ â€œCutsâ€ (Jeremy), â€œMaybe Itâ€™s Meâ€ (Rick Stage,) â€œRadio Activeâ€ (Blaire), â€œStudent Bodiesâ€ (JJ), and more.

Kendall Cross is Adele Dennison. Her credits include â€œMy Christmas Family Tree,â€ â€œThe Secret Lives of College Freshmen,â€ â€œAurora Teagarden Mysteries,â€ â€œHannah Swensen Mysteries,â€ â€œVirgin River,â€ The Crossword Mysteries,â€ â€œMarthaâ€™s Vineyard Mysteries,â€ â€œA Christmas Miracle,â€ â€œAnother Life,â€ â€œVan Helsing,â€ â€œRiverdale,â€ â€œThe Flash,â€ â€œBeyond,â€ â€œA Wish for Christmas,â€ â€œThe 100â€ (Major Byrne), â€œCedar Cove,â€ â€œElysium,â€ â€œCaprica,â€ â€œ16 Wishes,â€ â€œStargate SG-1,â€ â€œSnakes on a Plane,â€ â€œ10.5,â€ â€œSmallville,â€ â€œThe Butterfly Effectâ€ (Mrs. Kagan), â€œThe Magicianâ€™s House II,â€ and more.
